version_description:
Aggiornamento 1.0.1
- Segui la tua azione attraverso NYZ! Spingi attraverso ondate implacabili per sbloccare nuovi livelli! Quanto lontano puoi andare?
- Sei più forte dei tuoi amici? Controlla il tuo stato sulla nuova classifica delle onde più alte!
- Miglioramenti dell'interfaccia generale
- Tonnellate di correzioni di errori
- Qualità della vita e aggiustamenti di bilanciamento

- Adjustments to XP required to level
- Added trail animation for Zoe the Dog
- New visual effects
- Bug fixes and polish

- Added screen orientation rotation!
- Game now pauses in all menus!
- New EPIC Superstar Hair!
- Tap to run between waves!
- New Health Regeneration scroll!
- Tons of visual polish and bug fixes!

- New rewards for completing waves!
- New rewards for completing achievements!
- Battle your way through 3 new levels with new enemies, minibosses, and bosses!
- Are you the Kung Fu Master? Find out with new Leaderboards located in the Player Menu!
- Updates to the map transition!
- Adjustments to mastery point rewards after mastering!
- Updated mastery chest opening sequence!
- Added gear rarity titles!
- Tons of bug fixes and polish!
- 修正了在浏览教程部分时导致崩溃的错误。

- Collect and upgrade sidekicks with Sidekick Card Packs!
- Increase your Sidekick Power for a mega Power Bonus!
- Three new Sidekicks have joined the fight!
- Battle with Karate Bot and zap your way through NYZ!
- Glide through defeating enemies with Mystical Dragon!
- Start Kung Fu fighting as fast as lightning with Zhu Li!
- Adjustments to belt and level XP requirements!
- Jade points added as a reward for completing Frenzy!
- Bug fixes and polish!

- Fixed a bug with player not attacking some enemies
- Fixed a bug with kill streak counter not appearing correctly when changing areas
- Fixed a bug with Hit Streak Quests not completing
- Fixed a bug involving miniboss and boss collisions
- Back end fixes

Spooktober is here in NYZ!

- Head into the Zombie Invasion area and fight your way through hordes of zombies
- Collect tokens by completing quests and defeating bosses
- Turn your tokens in for awesome exclusive rewards!
- Collect two new Sidekicks and upgrade them for mega power!
- Four new spooky abilities!
- NEW! Costumes are here! Change your style without changing your gear. Costumes are permanent even after mastery!

Happy Halloween!

Spooktober is here in NYZ!
- Head into the Zombie Invasion area and fight your way through hordes of zombies
- Collect tokens by completing quests and defeating bosses
- Turn your tokens in for awesome exclusive rewards!
- Collect two new Sidekicks and upgrade them for mega power!
- Four new spooky abilities!
- NEW! Costumes are here! Change your style without changing your gear. Costumes are permanent even after mastery!

Happy Halloween!

- Fixed a bug with quests refreshing
- Fixed push notifcation text
- Back end fixes
- Back end fixes to Halloween bundles
- Fixed a bug causing white flash after certain animations

Update 1.4.0 - It's the most wonderful time of the year! We're celebrating in Kung Fu Z with a new Zombie Invasion event! Fa-la-la-la-la your way through hordes of zombies and complete Holiday quests to earn tokens. Turn your tokens in for awesome exclusive Holiday rewards, including brand new Costumes, Abilities and Sidekicks!

- Fixed a visual bug in leaderboards
- Fixed an audio bug in Jingle Bell Bash area
- Adjustments to language selection menu

- Fixed a bug causing some players to be in a higher event wave
- Fixed a bug with the Options menu causing crashes in some cases

- New sidekick bundles! Get awesome deals on all Sidekicks in new value packed bundles!
- Several bug fixes and improvements
- Fixed a bug with the Zhu Li Exploding Fists Bundle
Bug fixes, popup frequency reduced, polish.

Weapons. Bats, brass knuckles and fire breath.

2 new sidekicks. Morty and Artemis join the fight.

Some bug fixes and improvements.

It's a bird! It’s a plane! It's a somewhat familiar character made of lustrous metal ready to put an end to the zombie outbreak once and for all! For the first time, Tommy Spark has made his metal suit available for every player to use. Fight alongside Steely Guy and put an end to Dr. Z's nefarious plot to take over the world! In addition, we've made improvements to the UI flow, added more options in the store, improved all in-game localizations and fixed a host of bugs.
We've fixed some minor bugs and improved the ad delivery.
We've fixed an issue that was causing the game to crash after watching an ad. We apologize for the inconvenience!

It's Halloween in NYZ! Collect spooky sidekicks and creepy costumes!
We've improved translations for French, German, Japanese, Korean and Portuguese.
We've also fixed some ad-related issues.
We've improved our Russian language support and ad delivery.

We've improved:
• French, Japanese and Korean translations
• Support for other currencies
• Ad system via mediation

We fixed a bug that was giving the incorrect Halloween costume.

If you were affected by this bug, please contact support@tinytitanstudios.com. Thank you and we apologize for the inconvenience!

The latest update for Kung Fu Z includes:

• New Christmas Event!
• Game Center login fix.
• UI improvements.
• Various bug fixes.

Update 1.9.6 includes:

• Minor bug fixes
• Small quality of life improvements

1.9.7 includes:
• Overhaul on notifications
• Improved welcome back reward
• Ad presentation fixes for when an ad isn't available
• Minor bug fixes

1.9.8 includes:
• New sidekick Artemis available in card packs and featured sidekick rotation.
• Various quality of life improvements and minor bug fixes.

Update 1.9.9 includes:
• New sidekick bundles
• Overhaul on the ad system
• Significant bug fixes involving the leaderboard, data syncing and game notifications

Update 1.9.10 includes:
• Various compliance fixes

Update 1.9.11 includes:
• Reworked the revive options
• Improved the welcome back popup
• Various other bug fixes

1.9.12 includes:

• Ad presentation hotfix

1.9.13 includes:
• Sidekick bundles! Collect them all!

1.9.14 includes:
• Minor changes to the bundle presentation

Update 1.9.15 includes:
• Exclusive new Sidekicks!

Update 1.9.18 includes improvements to the prestige system!
• Completing the Mastery process is now optional
• Improved the instructions to better explain the process

Update 1.9.19 includes:
• The Spooktober Halloween Event!
• Minor bug fixes and quality of life improvements

Update 1.9.20 includes:

• Minor bug fixes and quality of life improvements
